title: Version 0.93.0 with SOCKS5 Proxy Support
description: Released January 31, 2026, adding optional SOCKS5 proxy listener support along with additional improvements and bug fixes. Can be installed via npm install -g @openai/codex@0.93.0.

community_feedback.quote: Recent Codex CLI updates resulted in decreased granularity of code change details in progress logs

title: Version 1.40.0 - Agent Skills and WSL Improvements
description: Released January 31, 2026. This update introduced agent skills in CLI, WSL (Windows Subsystem for Linux) detection with appropriate shell spawning, proportional output truncation for better readability, error retry logic for overloaded errors, and numerous bug fixes including improved WSL compatibility and MCP server handling.

title: Copilot Metrics and Data Residency
description: Released January 29, 2026 for GitHub Enterprise Cloud. Copilot metrics feature with data residency capabilities, currently in public preview for Copilot Enterprise customers.

title: Version 2.1.27 - Debug Log Improvements
description: Released January 27, 2026, adding debug log improvements and fresh release features. Auto-update channel information added to the /doctor command.

community_feedback.quote: My Claude Code performance has tanked and I'm not sure why - significant drop in quality

title: Version 0.26.0 - Latest Stable Release
description: Released January 27, 2026 as the current latest stable release, recommended for most users.

title: Version 0.25.0
description: Released January 20, 2026 with ongoing development and refinement.

title: Version 0.89.0 - Custom Prompts Deprecated
description: Released January 22, 2026, deprecating custom prompts in favor of skills for reusable instructions and workflows.

title: January 2026 Bug Fixes and Performance Improvements
description: Released January 21, 2026 with minor bug fixes and performance improvements across the platform. Includes Devin Review feature updates.
